description:
The story is told in 800 B.C. Sheep from different parts of the globe have gathered at the Green Grass
Sheep Olympics. There were sheep and goats from various tribes gathered on the field, including Pan sheep, mechanical sheep, black goat, mountain goat, sheep, Tibetan antelope and so on, which was very lively. And the cunning grey wolf naturally will not let go of this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, he mixes into the sheep games, trying to come up with all kinds of ways to catch the fat sheep to eat. Thus, a match of wits and courage between the sheep and the wolf began again.
source: bgm.tv/deepl

OTHER: 33:喜羊羊与灰太狼之羊羊运动会

titles.title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tai Lang: Yang Yang Yundonghui
喜羊羊与灰太狼之羊羊运动会
